subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jordin Tootoo’s go-ahead goal early in the third period lifted the host Detroit Red Wings to a 3-1 win over the Los Angeles Kings and into eighth place in the Western Conference.
snippet: Jordin Tootoo’s go-ahead goal early in the third period lifted the host Detroit Red Wings to a 3-1 win over the Los Angeles Kings and into eighth place in the Western Conference.
